scripts.reset: pnpm run clean && pnpm m exec -- rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm install --force
scripts.clean: pnpm m exec -- rm -rf dist && pnpm m exec -- rm -rf build
scripts.prebundle: pnpm run reset && pnpm run build && pnpm m run prebundle:prepare
scripts.bundle: pnpm i --no-lock --prod --shamefully-flatten --force && pnpm m run bundle:package
